declarations.comments: Get PureScript project root given a .purs file (identified by presence of bower.json)
declarations.title: getRoot

declarations.comments: Construct path to the port file identifying the psc-ide-server port
declarations.title: portFilePath

declarations.comments: Save a port to the port file
declarations.title: savePort

declarations.comments: Get the saved port for the given project directory (if present)
declarations.title: getSavedPort

declarations.comments: Generate a fresh port (just now, randomly with no check or retry)
declarations.title: pickFreshPort
